title: do key frags not drop on the "old" legacy client?
body: (i hope this is the right spot for this). i haven't gotten any key frags dropped since i switched back to the legacy client. with a decent amount victories across all diff game modes in the last 2-3 days. & i was getting them pretty often before i switched back to legacy, is it related at all like anyone else having this issue too, or just completely random bad luck ? & if so. i apologize for wasting time. thanks in adv for any reply

replies.body:
I've never heard or seen any issues with key fragment drops depending on which client you're using. This is more than likely caused by you earning a bunch of keys while you were using the Beta Client just before your change to the Legacy Client. The droprate for key fragments is a curve, rather than a line. This means that each key fragment that drops will reduce the chances of the next drop, and this continues exponentially. This rate will reset approximately 30 days after the first fragment dropped, so you should start seeing these drop again soon.

Let me know if you don't see any more key fragments after this droprate has had time to reset.

i've still yet to get a key frag. even winning victories a lot across every diff mode. and even playing in groups of people (which i think raises rate, but not certain so dont quote me on it) but yea i've gotten 1 or 2 chests since then, and some mastery 6 tokens. just haven't got another key frag. still stuck at 2. is it cause for concern yet? the last one i got was quite a while ago.

I wouldn't say this is cause for concern yet. You're correct that playing with friends in a premade does *slightly* raise your drop rate chances for a key fragment. I'd say we should hold out until it has been at least 30 days since your last key fragment so we can be sure that your drop rate has reset before we start looking into this further.

ty. yea i dont think it is the client, i tried the new one again for a few days. still nada. thanks for taking the time to clear it up
